Environment and public realm z Opportunities should be sought to extend and improve Langdon Park in its current location by ensuring that all of the park’s edges are addressed by good quality frontage. Improved public open space and public realm should also be provided towards the north of the estate, around the community centre. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 455 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS 25. Isle of Dogs and South Poplar Location 25.1 The Isle of Dogs and South Poplar sub-area is located to the south-east of the borough, bounded by the River Thames to the south, River Lea and the London Borough of Newham to the east, and East India Dock Road to the north. 25.2 The sub-area falls within the London Plan’s Isle of Dogs and South Poplar opportunity area.
